languages.text: "Свобода и созидание". {n}Отчего-то голос Кассии полнится печалью.{/n} "Будущим поколениям Дома Орселлио придется вновь {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_BrokenAtlas}положиться на собственные силы и благородную кровь{/d}, позабыв о проклятой мощи ксеноартефакта. Изнурительный труд, но подданные это понимают. Мы... справимся".

traits.locale_text: "Свобода и созидание". {n}Отчего-то голос Кассии полнится печалью.{/n} "Будущим поколениям Дома Орселлио придется вновь положиться на собственные силы и благородную кровь, позабыв о проклятой мощи ксено-артефакта. Изнурительный труд, но подданные это понимают. Мы... справимся".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Freedom and creation." {n}Cassia's voice is sorrowful for some reason.{/n} "Future generations of House Orsellio will once again have to {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_BrokenAtlas}rely on themselves and their noble blood{/d}. The cursed might of the xenos artefact will be a thing of the past. It will be an exhausting effort, but my subjects understand that. We... shall endure."
languages.original_text: "Свобода и созидание". {n}Отчего-то голос Кассии полнится печалью.{/n} "Будущим поколениям Дома Орселлио придется вновь {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_BrokenAtlas}положиться на собственные силы и благородную кровь{/d}, позабыв о проклятой мощи ксеноартефакта. Изнурительный труд, но подданные это понимают. Мы... справимся".

traits.locale_text: "Freedom and creation." {n}Cassia's voice is sorrowful for some reason.{/n} "Future generations of House Orsellio will once again have to rely on themselves and their noble blood. The cursed might of the xenos artifact will be a thing of the past. It will be an exhausting effort, but my subjects understand that. We... will manage."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Freedom and creation." {n}Cassia's voice is sorrowful for some reason.{/n} "Future generations of House Orsellio will once again have to rely on themselves and their noble blood. The cursed might of the xenos artifact will be a thing of the past. It will be an exhausting effort, but my subjects understand that. We... will manage."

traits.locale_text: "Freedom and creation." {n}Cassia's voice is sorrowful for some reason.{/n} "Future generations of House Orsellio will once again have to rely on themselves and their noble blood. The cursed might of the xenos artefact will be a thing of the past. It will be an exhausting effort, but my subjects understand that. We... shall endure."

The cursed might of the xenos artefact will be a thing of the past. It will be an exhausting effort, but my subjects understand that. We... shall endure."

traits.locale_text: "Freedom and creation." {n}Cassia's voice is sorrowful for some reason.{/n} "Future generations of House Orsellio will once again have to {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_BrokenAtlas}rely on themselves and their noble blood{/g}. The cursed might of the xenos artefact will be a thing of the past. It will be an exhausting effort, but my subjects understand that. We... shall endure."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我们将迎来自由与创造的时代。”{n}不知为何，卡西娅的声音很悲伤。{/n}“奥赛罗家族的后人将不得不再次{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_BrokenAtlas}依靠自己，依靠我们高贵的血统{/d}。那件被诅咒的异形造物，它的力量已经不复存在。尽管重建家族会付出巨大的努力，但我的族人会明白这一点。我们……会熬过去的。”
languages.original_text: "Freedom and creation." {n}Cassia's voice is sorrowful for some reason.{/n} "Future generations of House Orsellio will once again have to {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_BrokenAtlas}rely on themselves and their noble blood{/d}. The cursed might of the xenos artefact will be a thing of the past. It will be an exhausting effort, but my subjects understand that. We... shall endure."

traits.locale_text: “我们将迎来自由与创造的时代。”{n}不知为何，卡西娅的声音很悲伤。{/n}“奥塞罗家族的后人将不得不再次依靠自己，依靠我们高贵的血统。那件被诅咒的异形造物，它的力量已经不复存在。尽管重建家族会付出巨大的努力，但我的族人会明白这一点。我们……会熬过去的。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Freedom and creation." {n}Cassia's voice is sorrowful for some reason.{/n} "Future generations of House Orsellio will once again have to rely on themselves and their noble blood. The cursed might of the xenos artefact will be a thing of the past. It will be an exhausting effort, but my subjects understand that. We... shall endure."

languages.text: «Libertad y creación». {n}Por algún motivo, la voz de Cassia es triste.{/n} «Las generaciones futuras de la casa Orsellio volverán a tener que {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_BrokenAtlas}depender de sí mismas y de su sangre noble{/d}. El poder maldito del artefacto xenos pasa a ser cosa del pasado. La experiencia será agotadora, pero mis súbditos lo comprenden... Resistiremos».
languages.original_text: "Freedom and creation." {n}Cassia's voice is sorrowful for some reason.{/n} "Future generations of House Orsellio will once again have to {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_BrokenAtlas}rely on themselves and their noble blood{/d}. The cursed might of the xenos artefact will be a thing of the past. It will be an exhausting effort, but my subjects understand that. We... shall endure."

traits.locale_text: «Libertad y creación». {n}Por algún motivo, la voz de Cassia es triste.{/n} «Las generaciones futuras de la casa Orsellio volverán a tener que depender de sí mismas y de su sangre noble. El poder maldito del artefacto xenos pasa a ser cosa del pasado. La experiencia será agotadora, pero mis súbditos lo comprenden... Resistiremos».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「自由と創造」{n}カシアの声は、なぜか悲しげだった。{/n}「オーセリオ家の将来の世代は、再び{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_BrokenAtlas}己の力とその高貴な血{/d}に頼らなければならなくなるでしょう。異種族のアーティファクトの呪われた力は過去のものとなるでしょう。それは大変な努力ですが、臣民はそれを理解しています。我々は…耐えねばなりません」
languages.original_text: "Freedom and creation." {n}Cassia's voice is sorrowful for some reason.{/n} "Future generations of House Orsellio will once again have to {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_BrokenAtlas}rely on themselves and their noble blood{/d}. The cursed might of the xenos artefact will be a thing of the past. It will be an exhausting effort, but my subjects understand that. We... shall endure."

traits.locale_text: 「自由と創造」{n}カシアの声は、なぜか悲しげだった。{/n}「オーセリオ家の将来の世代は、再び{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_BrokenAtlas}己の力とその高貴な血{/d}に頼らなければならなくなるでしょう。異種族のアーティファクトの呪われた力は過去のものとなるでしょう。それは大変な努力ですが、臣民はそれを理解しています。我々は…耐えねばなりません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Freiheit und Schöpfung." {n}Cassias Stimme ist aus irgendeinem Grund voller Trauer.{/n} "Zukünftige Generationen des Haus Orsellio {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_BrokenAtlas}werden sich wieder auf sich selbst und ihr adliges Blut verlassen müssen{/d}. Die verfluchte Macht des Xenos-Artefakts wird dann Vergangenheit sein. Es wird ein anstrengend und mühsam werden, doch das wissen meine Untertanen. Wir ... werden es erdulden."
languages.original_text: "Freedom and creation." {n}Cassia's voice is sorrowful for some reason.{/n} "Future generations of House Orsellio will once again have to {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_BrokenAtlas}rely on themselves and their noble blood{/d}. The cursed might of the xenos artefact will be a thing of the past. It will be an exhausting effort, but my subjects understand that. We... shall endure."

traits.locale_text: "Freiheit und Schöpfung." {n}Cassias Stimme ist aus irgendeinem Grund voller Trauer.{/n} "Zukünftige Generationen des Haus Orsellio werden sich wieder auf sich selbst und ihr adliges Blut verlassen müssen. Die verfluchte Macht des Xenos-Artefakts wird dann Vergangenheit sein. Es wird ein anstrengend und mühsam werden, doch das wissen meine Untertanen. Wir ... werden es erdulden."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: Pour une raison qui vous échappe, la voix de Cassia est emplie de tristesse. « Ils vont être libres. Libres de créer. Les futures générations de la maison Orsellio vont devoir réapprendre à {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_BrokenAtlas}compter sur elles-mêmes et sur la noblesse de leur sang{/d}. La puissance maudite de l'artefact xénos ne sera plus pour eux qu'un lointain cauchemar. Nous allons devoir fournir des efforts considérables pour avancer, mais mes sujets en sont conscients. Nous... endurerons. »
languages.original_text: "Freedom and creation." {n}Cassia's voice is sorrowful for some reason.{/n} "Future generations of House Orsellio will once again have to {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_BrokenAtlas}rely on themselves and their noble blood{/d}. The cursed might of the xenos artefact will be a thing of the past. It will be an exhausting effort, but my subjects understand that. We... shall endure."

traits.locale_text: Pour une raison qui vous échappe, la voix de Cassia est emplie de tristesse. « Ils vont être libres. Libres de créer. Les futures générations de la maison Orsellio vont devoir réapprendre à {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_BrokenAtlas}compter sur elles-mêmes et sur la noblesse de leur sang{/g}. La puissance maudite de l'artefact xénos ne sera plus pour eux qu'un lointain cauchemar. Nous allons devoir fournir des efforts considérables pour avancer, mais mes sujets en sont conscients. Nous... endurerons. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Özgürlük ve yaratıcılık." {n}Nedense Cassia'nın sesine bir hüzün hâkim.{/n} "Orsellio Hanesi'nin gelecek nesilleri, yeniden kendi başının çaresine bakmalı. {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_BrokenAtlas}Soylu kanlarından başka hiçbir avantajları yok{/d}, zeno eserinin uğursuz gücü de maziye karışacak. Zahmetli günler geçireceğiz ama kullarım buna anlayış gösterecek. Buna tahammül edeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "Freedom and creation." {n}Cassia's voice is sorrowful for some reason.{/n} "Future generations of House Orsellio will once again have to {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_BrokenAtlas}rely on themselves and their noble blood{/d}. The cursed might of the xenos artefact will be a thing of the past. It will be an exhausting effort, but my subjects understand that. We... shall endure."

traits.locale_text: "Özgürlük ve yaratıcılık." {n}Nedense Cassia'nın sesine bir hüzün hâkim.{/n} "Orsellio Hanesi'nin gelecek nesilleri, yeniden kendi başının çaresine bakmalı. Ellerinde soylu kanlarından başka hiçbir kozları yok ve zeno eserinin uğursuz gücü de maziye karışacak. Zahmetli günler geçireceğiz ama kullarım buna anlayış gösterecek. Buna tahammül edeceğiz."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
